marklogic.body: It all . I've had my nose broken at least twice. No blood once and some small amount the second. Other times I didn't even know it was broken. I've had my head smashed into a brick wall and no blood dripping as my hair soaked it up. I've also had my head smashed into a fire hydrant and only small amount of blood although knocked out Cold for at least 5 minutes and stomped on my whole body. Not much blood but lots of broken bones. like ribs mostly. So it all Depends. I also lost a streetfight to a golden gloves champ. Too bad he was a bleeder. I caught him with two jabs and a couple straight rights to his 100 landed. Didn't matter as he was all bloodied up about the face. He looked like shi* but wasn't even hurting. I ran around after the fight claiming I kicked his bloody a&&. Too funny although I could hardly breathe from the beating.
